ygData.subject: Re: Question about skill advancement.
ygData.msgSnippet: I asked the same question, theres no really good Warrior only swords.  Im not an axe type of person so I wont be using any kind of axe (with the exception of
ygData.messageBody:
I asked the same question, theres no really good Warrior only swords. Im
not an axe type of person so I wont be using any kind of axe (with the
exception of exec if I get it, ever).

I dont think they should introduce a katana unless its in context. i.e.
theres a Japanese/Asian style race in the game, and they make them. I hated
how in UO they had katanas in a European setting with no explanation why
they existed. Maybe they could make the Lizard Men in the expansion Asiatic
and that place would be a good source for Asian weapons.

Id love to have Jaade make a harrowing trip to the Continent of the
lizardman just so she can get a katana and a wakazashi.

O.K. you know what you have to do, start a petition AND hit /feedback.

Thanks for the clarification there, so does kith have any meaning/context?

> ----------
> From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 1:02 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Question about skill advancement.
>
> From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
>
> >>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >>Wasn't the kith also the name of the Dark Force in starwars? I remember
> it
> >>being mentioned in Empire?? Its a nice sounding name.
>
>
> Nopers...it's the SITH. Those are the term for Jedi who use the Dark Side.
> Just thought I'd help ya out there.
>
> Ok, now my question. Is there a SWORD that is relatively as good as
> the
> Tommy? (Polished Granite Tomahawk)....I know I may be being traditional in
> the RP sense, but it seems like the best weapons for warriors are axes,
> and
> I usually think of them as having swords. And now that I am on the
> subject,
> why not a Katana? IMHO those are the fastest most damaging weapons IRL (my
> opinion is based on my knowledge of Kinjitsu). I really don't want to
> waste
> my time suggesting it because, like some other people, I am a "hard-core
> gamer" and played in and/or tested a lot of online games and I know that
> suggestions are very rarely taken into context. Maybe if everyone came up
> with some good ideas and we all signed them like a petition and sent it
> in,
> then they might listen? Well, that is my idea. I want a Katana. Maybe two.
> Anyone want to see anything else in the game?
>
> Tyveris,
> Aspiring Samauri
> (with no Katana)
>
>
